sentences: Inma Shara (Inmaculada Lucia Saratxaga, born 1972 in Amurrio, Spain) is a Spanish orchestral conductor.
Inma Shara conducted a concert in Madrid, with the attendance of her Majesty, the Queen Sophie, the profits were entirely used for the Queen Sophie Foundation and its project "Alzheimer".
In December 2008 she conducted a concert in the Vatican City chaired by Benedict XVI, in order to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
